text: yadi sahaje sampada labhera asa thakata o saphara sahaja hata tabe tara abasya'i apanara anusarana karata, kintu tadera kache yatrapatha sudirgha mane hala. Ara acire'i tara allah‌ra name sapatha kare balabe, ‘parale amara nisca'i tomadera sathe bera hatama.‘Tara tadera nijederake'i dhbansa kare. Ara allah‌ janena niscaya tara mithyabadi
